name: Raea Roo Game
description:
You are an organic experiment to a mad Doctor, but you've awoken and find yourself trapped. Your only chance is to find buttons around the lab to escape!

you have 3 options:

red buttons- defeat the Doctors subordinate in charge of the facility, to make sure no one knows of your escape

green buttons- to wreck the forces of the lab to give yourself more time to find help in the outside world

blue- run, and hope that you can outrun an almost endless amount of robots as they chase you down in the outside world

Made for https://itch.io/jam/metroidvania-month-7

there are a few known bugs (chance to die when killing an enemy), that I haven't been able to fix. And there are a few quality of life additions I might make down the line. But I'm just happy to finish this and soon get back to making my main project. Apacies a loveletter series! Please check it out!
